snippet: Ms. Piazza sang with the Metropolitan Opera, appeared on TV and performed on the supper-club circuit in the United States and Cuba.
abstract: Marguerite Piazza, versatile singer who sang with the Metropolitan Opera, appeared in variety shows on television and performed in nightclubs, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Piazza sang with the Metropolitan Opera, appeared on TV and performed on the supper-club circuit in the United States and Cuba.

headline.seo: Marguerite Piazza, Popular Singer of Opera, Dies at 86
headline.main: Marguerite Piazza, Popular Singer of Opera, Dies at 86
